title: Ultrafast single-shot diffraction imaging of nanoscale dynamics
title_cn: 纳米级动力学的超快单次衍射成像
abstract: The transient nanoscale dynamics of materials on femtosecond to picosecond timescales is of great interest in the study of condensed phase dynamics such as crack formation, phase separation and nucleation, and rapid fluctuations in the liquid state or in biologically relevant environments. The ability to take images in a single shot is the key to studying non-repetitive behaviour mechanisms, a capability that is of great importance in many of these problems. Using coherent diffraction imaging with femtosecond X-ray free-electron-laser pulses we capture time-series snapshots of a solid as it evolves on the ultrafast timescale. Artificial structures imprinted on a Si3N4 window are excited with an optical laser and undergo laser ablation, which is imaged with a spatial resolution of 50 nm and a temporal resolution of 10 ps. By using the shortest available free-electron-laser wavelengths and proven synchronization methods this technique could be extended to spatial resolutions of a few nanometres and temporal resolutions of a few tens of femtoseconds. This experiment opens the door to a new regime of time-resolved experiments in mesoscopic dynamics.
abstract_cn: 从飞秒到皮秒的时间尺度，材料的瞬态纳米尺度动力学对于研究凝聚相动力学（例如裂纹形成，相分离和成核以及液态或生物学相关环境中的快速波动）非常感兴趣。一次拍摄图像的能力是研究非重复性行为机制的关键，这种能力在许多此类问题中非常重要。使用具有飞秒X射线自由电子激光脉冲的相干衍射成像，我们可以捕获固体在超快时间尺度上演化的时间序列快照。刻在Si 3 N 4 窗口上的人工结构被光学激光激发并进行激光烧蚀，其空间分辨率为50＆＃160nm 10 ps的时间分辨率。通过使用最短的可用自由电子激光波长和行之有效的同步方法，该技术可以扩展到几纳米的空间分辨率和几十飞秒的时间分辨率。该实验为介观动力学中时间分辨实验的新机制打开了大门。

title: Blood-vessel closure using photosensitizers engineered for two-photon excitation
title_cn: 使用为双光子激发而设计的光敏剂封闭血管
abstract: The spatial control of optical absorption provided by two-photon excitation has led to tremendous advances in microscopy and microfabrication. Medical applications of two-photon excitation in photodynamic therapy have been widely suggested, but thus far have been rendered impractical by the low two-photon cross-sections of photosensitizer drugs (which are compounds taken up by living tissues that become toxic on absorption of light). The invention of efficient two-photon activated drugs will allow precise three-dimensional manipulation of treatment volumes, providing a level of targeting unattainable with current therapeutic techniques. Here we present a new family of photodynamic therapy drugs designed for efficient two-photon excitation and use one of them to demonstrate selective closure of blood vessels through two-photon excitation photodynamic therapy in vivo. These conjugated porphyrin dimers have two-photon cross-sections that are more than two orders of magnitude greater than those of standard clinical photosensitizers. This is the first demonstration of in vivo photodynamic therapy using a photosensitizer engineered for efficient two-photon excitation.
abstract_cn: 由双光子激发提供的光吸收的空间控制已导致显微技术和微细加工的巨大进步。广泛建议在光动力疗法中使用双光子激发的医学应用，但是迄今为止，由于光敏剂药物的低两个光子横截面（活体组织吸收的化合物在吸收光时变得有毒，因此光子横截面较低）而变得不切实际。 ）。有效的双光子活化药物的发明将允许对治疗量进行精确的三维操纵，从而提供当前治疗技术无法达到的靶向水平。在这里，我们介绍了一个新的光动力疗法药物家族，旨在有效地激发两光子，并使用其中一种来证明通过体内的两光子激发光动力疗法选择性关闭血管。这些共轭的卟啉二聚体具有比标准临床光敏剂大两个数量级的两个光子截面。这是使用光敏剂进行有效的双光子激发的体内光动力疗法的首次演示。

title: An avalanche‐photodiode-based photon-number-resolving detector
title_cn: 基于雪崩光电二极管的光子数解析探测器
abstract: Avalanche photodiodes are widely used as practical detectors of single photons. Although conventional devices respond to one or more photons, they cannot resolve the number of photons in the incident pulse or in a short time interval. However, photon-number-resolving detectors are urgently needed for applications in quantum computing, communications and interferometry, as well as for extending the applicability of quantum detection generally. Here we show that, contrary to current belief, avalanche photodiodes are capable of detecting photon number, using a technique to measure very weak avalanches at the early stage of their development. Under such conditions the output signal from the avalanche photodiode is proportional to the number of photons in the incident pulse. As a compact, mass-manufactured device, operating without cryogens and at telecom wavelengths, it offers a practical solution for photon number detection.
abstract_cn: 雪崩光电二极管被广泛用作单光子的实用探测器。 尽管常规设备响应一个或多个光子，但它们无法解析入射脉冲或短时间间隔内的光子数量。 然而，迫切需要光子数分辨检测器用于量子计算，通信和干涉测量中，以及普遍地扩展量子检测的适用性。 在这里，我们表明，与当前的观点相反，雪崩光电二极管能够检测光子数，并使用一种技术在其发展初期测量非常弱的雪崩。 在这种情况下，雪崩光电二极管的输出信号与入射脉冲中的光子数量成正比。 作为一种紧凑的，批量生产的设备，无需制冷剂即可在电信波长下运行，为光子数检测提供了实用的解决方案。</ p>

title: Resonance-driven random lasing
abstract: A random laser is a system formed by a random assembly of elastic scatterers dispersed into an optical gain medium. The multiple light scattering replaces the standard optical cavity of traditional lasers and the interplay between gain and scattering determines the lasing properties. All random lasers studied to date have consisted of irregularly shaped or polydisperse scatterers, with a certain average scattering strength that was constant over the frequency window of the laser. In this letter we consider the case where the scattering is resonant. We demonstrate that randomly assembled monodisperse spheres can sustain scattering resonances over the gain frequency window, and that the lasing wavelength can therefore be controlled by means of the diameter and refractive index of the spheres. The system is therefore a random laser with an a priori designed lasing peak within the gain curve.
abstract_cn: 随机激光器是由分散在光增益介质中的弹性散射体的随机组装形成的系统。 多重光散射取代了传统激光器的标准光学腔，增益和散射之间的相互作用决定了激光的特性。 迄今为止，所有随机激光器均由不规则形状或多分散的散射体组成，具有一定的平均散射强度，该强度在激光器的频率范围内是恒定的。 在这封信中，我们考虑了散射是共振的情况。 我们证明，随机组装的单分散球体可以在增益频率窗口上维持散射共振，因此可以通过球体的直径和折射率来控制激光发射波长。 因此，该系统是随机激光器，其增益曲线内具有先验设计的激光峰值。</ p>

title: Waveguide-integrated, ultralow-energy GeSi electro-absorption modulators
title_cn: 集成波导的超低能量GeSi电吸收调制器
abstract: Waveguide-integrated photonic modulators are crucial devices when encoding optical signals for electronic–photonic integration on silicon. Silicon photonic modulators based on the free carrier plasma dispersion effect have undergone significant development in recent years, reaching speeds of 40 Gbit s–1 (ref. ). Some issues yet to be resolved include the large size and the relatively high energy consumption of silicon Mach–Zehnder interferometer modulators, and the susceptibility to fabrication errors as well as a limited operation wavelength range of ∼1 nm for silicon microring modulators. We demonstrate the first waveguide-integrated GeSi electro-absorption modulator on silicon with a small active device area of 30 µm2, a 10-dB extinction ratio at 1,540 nm, an operating spectrum range of 1,539–1,553 nm, ultralow energy consumption of 50 fJ per bit, and a 3-dB bandwidth of 1.2 GHz. This device offers unique advantages for use in high-performance electronic–photonic integration with complementary metal oxide semiconductor circuits.
abstract_cn: 集成波导的光子调制器是对用于硅上电子光子集成的光信号进行编码时的关键设备。近年来，基于自由载流子等离子体扩散效应的硅光子调制器已经取得了长足的发展，速度达到了40Gbits s ＆＃8211; 1 （ref。＆＃160; ）。尚待解决的一些问题包括硅Mach®Zehnder干涉仪调制器的大尺寸和相对较高的能耗，易受制造误差的影响以及硅微环的工作波长范围限制为＆＃8764; 1 nm调制器。我们演示了第一个在波导上集成了GeSi的GeSi电吸收调制器，其有源器件面积小为30＆＃181; m 2 ，在1,540＆＃160nm处的消光比为10 dB，工作频谱范围为1,539＆amp; 1,553＆＃160; nm，每比特50 ffJ的超低能耗，以及1.2＆＃160 GHz的3 dB带宽。该器件在与互补金属氧化物半导体电路实现高性能电子光子集成方面具有独特的优势。

title: Subwavelength colour imaging with a metallic nanolens
title_cn: 金属纳米透镜的亚波长彩色成像
abstract: Early research into metamaterials by other scientists has shown that nanostructured metamaterials can focus incident light and act as a lens. Although such structures are capable of subwavelength imaging, they have two major restrictions: they can only work at one particular wavelength, and the image can only be transferred for a short distance within the limits of the near field and is therefore undetectable in the far field. Here, we propose a lens made of stacked silver nanorods that is capable of colour imaging at subwavelength resolution in the visible range. The subwavelength image can be transferred over distances of at least micrometre scale and magnified before detection by conventional optics devices. Such a nanorod lens has the potential to be an indispensable imaging tool, with particular application to biomedical applications, where individual viruses and other nano-entities could be imaged in colour in the far field.
abstract_cn: 其他科学家对超材料的早期研究表明，纳米结构超材料可以聚焦入射光并充当透镜。 尽管这种结构能够进行亚波长成像，但它们有两个主要限制：它们只能在一个特定的波长下工作，并且图像只能在近场范围内短距离传输，因此在远场中无法检测到 。 在这里，我们提出了一种由堆叠的银纳米棒制成的透镜，该透镜能够在可见光范围内以亚波长分辨率进行彩色成像。 亚波长图像可在至少微米尺度的距离上转移并在通过常规光学装置检测之前放大。 这种纳米棒透镜有可能成为必不可少的成像工具，尤其是在生物医学应用中，其中单个病毒和其他纳米实体可以在远场中以彩色成像。
